    • performCommand

      public abstract <T> T performCommand​(java.lang.Object... commandArgs) throws WekaException
      Perform the command
      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type
      Parameters:
      commandArgs - arguments to the command
      Returns:
      the result, or null if the command does not return a result
      Throws:
      WekaException - if a problem occurs
